metadata.name: MacOS Scripting Interpreter AppleScript
metadata.comment: Detects execution of AppleScript of the macOS scripting language AppleScript.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/osascript')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.scpt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.js'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of AppleScript of the macOS scripting language AppleScript.

metadata.objective: False positive: Application installers might contain scripts as part of the installation process. References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1059.002/T1059.002.md, https://redcanary.com/blog/applescript/
